content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Mademoiselle Müller, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much were you thinking of paying per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. I was thinking of paying 300 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 300 euros per month is quite a low offer, considering the location and the quality of the apartment. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can understand that. How about 350 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 350 euros per month is still below my expectations. I'm willing to negotiate, but I must insist on a price that reflects the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I am willing to go higher. How about 400 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 400 euros per month is more in line with what I had in mind. However, I'm sure you're aware that the market value for such an apartment is even higher. Would you be able to offer closer to 500 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 500 euros per month is too high for me. I appreciate your consideration, but I cannot afford that amount. How about 450 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 450 euros per month is a step in the right direction, but it's still not quite what I'm looking for. I'm sorry, but I must insist on a price that reflects the market value of the apartment. Would you be able to offer closer to 500 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position, but 500 euros per month is just too high for me. I cannot afford that amount. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are asking for is above my budget as a student.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mademoiselle Müller. If you're unable to meet my asking price, then I don't see any point in continuing the negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
